article_title: With information on hospices lacking, families roll the dice picking medical care for dying kin
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — More than a million times a year, a terminally ill patient in the United States is enrolled in hospice care. Each time, the family confronts a decision that often must be made almost blindly: Which hospice to hire??
